# Introduction {background-color="#2C5F87"}

## Project Overview

::: {.incremental}
- **Challenge**: Organizations process large volumes of documents daily
- **Problem**: Manual review is slow, error-prone, and costly
- **Privacy Risk**: Cloud-based tools require external data storage
- **HR Bottleneck**: Resume screening is time-consuming and inconsistent
- **Our Solution**: Secure, on-premises Document AI system with intelligent search, question answering, and automated HR resume screening
:::

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}

# Objectives {background-color="#2C5F87"}

## Project Objectives

::: {.panel-tabset}
### Primary Goal
Develop a secure, on-premise AI system for document processing, intelligent retrieval, and automated HR resume screening

### Specific Objectives
1. **Automated Pipeline**: OCR, text extraction, metadata generation
2. **Semantic Search**: Vector-based retrieval with natural language queries
3. **RAG Integration**: Context-aware question answering
4. **HR Module**: Gmail integration for automated resume screening and candidate shortlisting
5. **User Interface**: Unified web interface for all operations
6. **Privacy**: All processing within organizational environment
7. **Scalability**: Modular architecture for future extensions
:::

## SMART Criteria

| Criterion | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| **Specific** | On-premise Document AI with OCR, RAG-based QA, and HR automation |
| **Measurable** | >85% retrieval accuracy, <3s response time, automated resume shortlisting |
| **Achievable** | Using proven technologies (Python, FastAPI, vector DBs, open-source LLMs) |
| **Relevant** | Addresses document management and HR screening inefficiencies |
| **Time-bound** | 20 weeks (November 2025 - March 2026) |

# Literature Review {background-color="#2C5F87"}

## Existing Solutions

::: {.panel-tabset}
### Cloud AI Platforms
**Google Document AI / Azure / Amazon Textract**

- Powerful OCR and extraction
- High scalability
- **Limitation**: Requires external data upload
- **Gap**: Privacy and compliance concerns

### HR Systems
**BambooHR / Workday / Lever / Greenhouse**

- Resume management and tracking
- Workflow streamlining
- **Limitation**: Basic keyword parsing
- **Gap**: No semantic understanding or AI-powered shortlisting

### Vector Search
**Pinecone / Weaviate / FAISS**

- Strong semantic retrieval
- Efficient indexing
- **Limitation**: No complete document workflow
- **Gap**: Requires manual pipeline construction
:::

## Research Gap

::: {.callout-warning}
## Key Gap
No existing solution provides:

- **On-premise** deployment with complete data control
- **Integrated** document processing + semantic search + RAG
- **Automated HR screening** with AI-powered candidate evaluation
- **Privacy-preserving** architecture for sensitive data
:::

# Methodology {background-color="#2C5F87"}

## System Architecture

```{mermaid}
%%| fig-height: 5
graph TB
    A[Documents<br/>PDF, Word, Scans] --> B[Processing Pipeline]
    C[HR Resumes via Gmail] --> D[Candidate Shortlist]
    B --> E[OCR & Metadata Extraction]
    E --> F[Vector Database /<br/>Knowledge Base]
    G[User Queries] --> H[RAG Engine]
    F --> H
    H --> I[Answers / Summaries]
    I --> J[Web Interface / Dashboard]
    D --> J

    style A fill:#4A90E2
    style C fill:#FFB84D
    style H fill:#50C878
    style D fill:#FF6B6B
```

## Implementation Approach

::: {.panel-tabset}
### Document Processing
- OCR and text extraction
- Document classification
- Metadata generation
- Vector embedding creation

### Knowledge Base
- Semantic vector storage
- Efficient indexing
- Fast retrieval operations

### RAG Pipeline
- Context retrieval from documents
- Natural language response generation
- Source attribution

### HR Module
- Gmail API integration
- Resume information extraction
- Criteria-based evaluation
- Automated shortlisting
:::

## Tools & Technologies

| Component | Technology |
|-----------|-----------|
| Language | Python |
| Backend | FastAPI / Flask |
| Frontend | React / Next.js |
| Database | PostgreSQL + Vector DB (FAISS/ChromaDB) |
| OCR | Tesseract / PyMuPDF |
| AI/NLP | Transformers, LangChain |
| Integration | Gmail API, n8n |
| Deployment | Docker containers |
